TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供各种属性更改事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for various property changed events.

summary.span: 通常这些事件对只读依赖属性的值中的有效值更改进行报告。

span.span: Typically these events report effective value changes in the value of a read-only dependency property.

summary.span: 另一个用法是用作 实现的一部分。

span.span: Another usage is as part of a implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件事件数据的类和方法实现作为处理程序，通常遵循命名模式`Is*Changed`，并作为通常实施[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，而不（它们不是路由的事件） 的支持。The events that use the class for event data, and the method implementations for handlers, generally follow the naming pattern `Is*Changed`, and are generally implemented as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events without backing (they are not routed events). 某些类处理方法，用于"处理"，否则未公开如报告属性更改，通过状态更改的事件，还使用事件数据的类。Some class handling methods that "handle" otherwise unexposed events that report a state change through a property change, such as , also use the class for event data. 方案是使用来自该属性的属性系统计算的报表旧和新值的自变量。The scenario for is to use the arguments to report old and new values that come from the property system evaluation of the property. 处理新旧值的回调可能选择根据这些值，例如选择不响应被认为是无意义的值更改的特殊处理。A callback that processes old and new values might choose special handling depending on these values, such as choosing to not respond to value changes that are deemed insignificant. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的上下文中的类还定义了事件的自定义类的特定属性。The following example uses the class in the context of a for a particular property of a custom class that also defines events. 回调将的结果的旧和新值的属性系统中，通过传递作为，和重新打包成不同的事件自变量类这些。The callback takes the results of old and new values from the property system as communicated by , and repackages these into a different events arguments class . 新的自变量然后的数据用于定义和自定义的类引发的一个"ValueChanged"事件。The new arguments are then used as the data for a "ValueChanged" event defined by and raised by the custom class. [!code-csharp[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/CSharp/NumericUpDown.cs#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)] [!code-vb[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/visualbasic/numericupdown.vb#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)]

Public Sub New (property As DependencyProperty, oldValue As Object, newValue As Object)
public: DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs(System::Windows::DependencyProperty ^ property, System::Object ^ oldValue, System::Object ^ newValue);

param.name: property
param.span: 更改的依赖项属性的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the dependency property that changed.

param.name: oldValue
param.span: 相关事件报告更改或状态更改之前的属性的值。

span.span: The value of the property before the change reported by the relevant event or state change.

param.name: newValue
param.span: 相关事件报告更改或状态更改之后的属性的值。

span.span: The value of the property after the change reported by the relevant event or state change.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 报告依赖项属性更改的自定义事件的实施者应使用此构造函数引发事件时将填充更改的具体情况的事件数据。Implementers of custom events that report dependency property changes should use this constructor for populating the event data with the specifics of the change when the event is raised.

summary.span: 返回提供的对象是否与当前 相同。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的类型应始终是值的强制转换为正在报告的依赖项属性的类型。The type of the value provided should always be castable to the type of the dependency property being reported. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的上下文中的类还定义了事件的自定义类的特定属性。The following example uses the class in the context of a for a particular property of a custom class that also defines events. 回调将的结果的旧和新值的属性系统中，通过传递作为，和重新打包成不同的事件自变量类这些。The callback takes the results of old and new values from the property system as communicated by , and repackages these into a different events arguments class . 新的自变量然后的数据用于定义和自定义的类引发的一个"ValueChanged"事件。The new arguments are then used as the data for a "ValueChanged" event defined by and raised by the custom class. summary.span: 获取发生值更改的依赖项属性的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the dependency property where the value change occurred.

value.span: 发生值更改的依赖项属性的标识符字段。

span.span: The identifier field of the dependency property where the value change occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是如果在一组公共使用相关注册多个属性，并且有必要消除歧义的属性更改调用回调。This property is relevant if used within a common that is registered for several properties, and it is necessary to disambiguate which property change invoked the callback. 无关通常用于引发事件，因为没有通常属性和事件之间存在 1:1 的对应关系属性更改该报表。 is not typically relevant for raising events, because there is usually a 1:1 correspondence between properties and events that report the property change. 已引发的事件的本身就可的指示更改的属性。The event that was raised is itself the indication of which property changed.
